title: Ploughing the field: how it is beneficial for farmers
caption: Chickpea pests and diseases
author: MandiSystem
content: Chickpea is an important rabi crop in India. Several insect pests cause heavy yield losses if not managed properly. The most common pests include pod borer, aphids, cutworms and termites. Farmers should adopt integrated pest management practices such as crop rotation, pheromone traps and need-based pesticide use.

title: Uttar Pradesh Sends MSP Proposals for 10 Kharif Crops
caption: MSP proposal update
author: MandiSystem
content: The Uttar Pradesh government has sent MSP proposals for 10 major Kharif crops to the central government.

title: Cotton Turns White Gold Again as Prices Rise
caption: Cotton market surge
author: MandiSystem
content: Cotton prices have surged again due to strong export demand and limited supply.
